CheckTitle: Ensure Connection Filter IP Allow List is Empty
Description: Checks if the IP Allow List in the Default Hosted Connection Filter Policy is empty.
Risk: If the IP Allow List is not empty, unwanted or risky IPs may bypass anti-spam and anti-malware protections.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Microsoft 365 Defender (https://security.microsoft.com). 2. Expand Email & collaboration > Policies & rules > Threat policies. 3. Under Policies, select Anti-spam. 4. Edit the Default policy and clear the IP Allow List.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure the IP Allow List is empty unless there is a specific, justified need.

Notes: This check validates that the IP Allow List is empty in the Default Hosted Connection Filter Policy.
